CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 20, 1960, pg. B10 reads: "Chi Delta Mu Fraternity Entertains Lavishly - Dr. M.R. Hadley, far right; Mrs. Hadley to his left, and guests." Portion of accompanying article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 20, 1960, pg. A7 by Toki Schalk Johnson reads:"Wednesday brought forth the annual dinner dance given by the Chi Delta Mu Fraternity in beautifully decorated New Arena."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait  including Dr. M.R. Hadley, right, and Mrs. Hadley, second from right, Jessie Vann third from right, Wilhelmina Brown and Judge Homer Brown, and Miriam Sharpe Fountain seated at rectangular banquet tables, and Marion Bond Jordan, Councilman James Jordan, Adah Lavelle and Robert Lavelle Sr.  in background  for Chi Delta Mu dinner dance in New Arena Supper Club
